scripts.build:clean: pnpm run clean && pnpm run build
scripts.deploy: pnpm run build && (find dist -type f -size +25M -delete 2>/dev/null || true) && wrangler pages deploy
scripts.dev:clean: pnpm run clean && pnpm run dev
scripts.install:clean: pnpm run clean && node -e "try{require('fs').rmSync(require('path').join(process.cwd(),'node_modules'),{recursive:true,force:true})}catch(_){}" && pnpm i
